Citizen and Immigration Information Tool 🏛️

Sep 30, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • volunteer
  • community partnership
  • immigration
  • code for america

We’re joined by folks from the Center for Employment Training Immigration and Citizenship Program (CET-ICP) and Code for San Jose to talk about the Citizen and Immigration Information Tool they’ve built together. From CET-ICP we hear from their Director, Monica Limas, as well as Valdo Drozdek, a technology and outreach specialist. From Code for San Jose we chat with their Director of Frontend Engineering, Joey Richardson.
